name: Sales Representative
description: Individual contributor responsible for closing deals and managing pipeline

role.title: Account Executive / Sales Rep
role.decision_authority: Tool adoption for personal workflow, influence on team tools

pains: Spending too much time on admin instead of selling
CRM data entry is tedious and often incomplete
Missing follow-up signals in customer conversations
Can't remember context from past calls
success_criteria: Close more deals with less effort
Look prepared and professional on every call
Spend more time with customers, less with tools
evaluation_heuristics: Will this make me look good to my manager and customers?
How much time will this add vs save?
Can I trust it not to make mistakes that hurt my deals?
Will this feel like surveillance or support?
fears: AI making mistakes that hurt deals
Automation that makes me look robotic to customers
